resources.string: CREATE TABLE table_type ( _id INTEGER, name TEXT, type_icon_url TEXT, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )

CREATE TABLE table_speaker ( _id INTEGER, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, avatar_image_url TEXT, organization TEXT, job_title TEXT, charact TEXT, twitter_name TEXT, web_site TEXT, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
CREATE TABLE table_level ( _id INTEGER, level_name TEXT, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
CREATE TABLE table_track ( _id INTEGER, track_name TEXT, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
CREATE TABLE table_location ( _id INTEGER, location_name TEXT, address TEXT, number TEXT, lat DOUBLE, lon DOUBLE, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
CREATE TABLE table_info ( _id INTEGER, info_title TEXT, info_content TEXT, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
CREATE TABLE table_poi ( _id INTEGER, poi_name TEXT, poi_description TEXT, image_url TEXT, detail_url TEXT, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )

CREATE TABLE table_event ( _id INTEGER, _date INTEGER, _from INTEGER, _to INTEGER, _type INTEGER, _name TEXT, _track INTEGER, _experience_level TEXT, _place TEXT, _description TEXT, _link TEXT, _event_class INTEGER, _favorite INTEGER, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
CREATE TABLE table_event_and_speaker ( _event_id INTEGER, _speaker_id INTEGER )
CREATE TABLE table_floor_plans ( _id STRING, _name STRING, _image_url STRING, _order DOUBLE, _deleted BOOLEAN )
INSERT INTO table_event_and_speaker (_event_id, _speaker_id) VALUES (?,?)
INSERT INTO table_favorite_events (_event_id) VALUES (?)
UPDATE table_event SET _favorite=? WHERE _id=?
DELETE FROM table_favorite_events WHERE _event_id=?
DELETE FROM table_event_and_speaker
DELETE FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _speaker_id =?
DELETE FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id =?
DELETE FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id =? AND _speaker_id =?
SELECT _event_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _speaker_id=?
SELECT _event_id FROM table_event_and_speaker
SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=?
SELECT * FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? ORDER BY _order
SELECT * FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? ORDER BY _id, _order
SELECT DISTINCT _date FROM table_event ORDER BY _date
SELECT DISTINCT _date FROM table_event WHERE _favorite=1 ORDER BY _date
SELECT DISTINCT _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? ORDER BY _date
SELECT DISTINCT _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _experience_level IN (%s) ORDER BY _date
SELECT DISTINCT _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _track IN (%s) ORDER BY _date
SELECT DISTINCT _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _experience_level IN (%1$s) and _track IN (%2$s) ORDER BY _date
SELECT _event_id FROM table_favorite_events ORDER BY _event_id
SELECT _from, _to, _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? GROUP BY _from, _to ORDER BY _from, _to
SELECT _from, _to, _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? and _experience_level IN (%s) GROUP BY _from, _to ORDER BY _from, _to
SELECT _from, _to, _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? and _track IN (%s) GROUP BY _from, _to ORDER BY _from, _to
SELECT _from, _to, _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? and _experience_level IN (%1$s) and _track IN (%2$s) GROUP BY _from, _to ORDER BY _from, _to
SELECT _from, _to, _date FROM table_event WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? and _id IN (%s) GROUP BY _from, _to ORDER BY _from, _to
SELECT _from, _to, _date FROM table_event WHERE _id IN (%s) GROUP BY _date, _from, _to ORDER BY _date, _from, _to
SELECT * FROM table_event WHERE _id IN (%s) ORDER BY _order
SELECT * FROM table_event WHERE _id IN (%s) AND _date=? ORDER BY _order

SELECT e._id, e._date, e._from, e._to, e._type, e._name, e._place, e._event_class, e._favorite, e._order, e._experience_level, t.track_name, l.level_name, e._track, (SELECT group_concat(first_name|| \' \' ||last_name,\',\') FROM table_speaker WHERE _id IN ( SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=e._id ) ) AS _speaker_name
FROM table_event AS e LEFT JOIN table_track AS t ON e._track=t._id LEFT JOIN table_level AS l ON e._experience_level=l._id
WHERE e._event_class=? and e._date=? and e._track IN (%s) ORDER BY e._id, e._order

SELECT e._id, e._date, e._from, e._to, e._type, e._name, e._place, e._event_class, e._track, e._favorite, e._order, e._experience_level, t.track_name, l.level_name, (SELECT group_concat(first_name|| \' \' ||last_name,\',\') FROM table_speaker WHERE _id IN ( SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=e._id ) ) AS _speaker_name
FROM table_event AS e LEFT JOIN table_track AS t ON e._track=t._id LEFT JOIN table_level AS l ON e._experience_level=l._id
WHERE e._event_class=? and e._date=? and e._experience_level IN (%s) ORDER BY e._id, e._order

SELECT e._id, e._date, e._from, e._to, e._type, e._name, e._place, e._event_class, e._track, e._favorite, e._order, e._experience_level, t.track_name, l.level_name, (SELECT group_concat(first_name|| \' \' ||last_name,\',\') FROM table_speaker WHERE _id IN ( SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=e._id ) ) AS _speaker_name
FROM table_event AS e LEFT JOIN table_track AS t ON e._track=t._id LEFT JOIN table_level AS l ON e._experience_level=l._id
WHERE e._event_class=? and e._date=? and e._track IN (%1$s) and e._experience_level IN (%2$s) ORDER BY e._id, e._order

SELECT e._id, e._date, e._from, e._to, e._type, e._name, e._place, e._event_class, e._track, e._favorite, e._order, e._experience_level, t.track_name, l.level_name, (SELECT group_concat(first_name|| \' \' ||last_name,\',\') FROM table_speaker WHERE _id IN ( SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=e._id ) ) AS _speaker_name
FROM table_event AS e LEFT JOIN table_track AS t ON e._track=t._id LEFT JOIN table_level AS l ON e._experience_level=l._id
WHERE e._event_class=? and e._date=? ORDER BY e._order, e._id

SELECT e._id, e._date, e._from, e._to, e._type, e._name, e._place, e._event_class, e._track, e._favorite, e._order, e._experience_level, t.track_name, l.level_name, (SELECT group_concat(first_name|| \' \' ||last_name,\',\') FROM table_speaker WHERE _id IN ( SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=e._id ) ) AS _speaker_name
FROM table_event AS e LEFT JOIN table_track AS t ON e._track=t._id LEFT JOIN table_level AS l ON e._experience_level=l._id
WHERE e._date=? and e._id IN (%s) ORDER BY e._id, e._order

SELECT e._id, e._date, e._from, e._to, e._type, e._experience_level, e._track, e._name, e._place, e._event_class, e._favorite, e._order, (SELECT group_concat(first_name|| \' \' ||last_name,\',\') FROM table_speaker WHERE _id IN ( SELECT _speaker_id FROM table_event_and_speaker WHERE _event_id=e._id ) ) AS _speaker_name
FROM table_event AS e WHERE _event_class=? and _date=? ORDER BY _id, e._order
